column4: Does anyone know the answer to my question about /etc/modprobe.d/lrm-video?
if you do cd /etc/modprobe.d and then type ls it should tell you what you have in there, if it's not in there then im guessing you nee something else
Its not there. I'm guessing theres some equivalent somewhere?
The howto i was reading said I needed to install the latest nvidia driver from the website, but I'm having real trouble doing it
